pages.text: Forged in the $(blood)Hellfire Forge$() using components touched by flight and gravity. The anvil represents the crushing weight of divine judgment.

A reagent infused with divine fury and crushing judgment. This catalyst can be combined with a $(item)Demon Slate$() in an Alchemy Array to create the $(l:animus:sigil_heavenly_wrath)Sigil of Heavenly Wrath$().

pages.title: Divine Judgment
pages.text: The heavens themselves shall rain judgment upon your foes. This powerful reagent channels forces that lift enemies skyward before casting them down with crushing force.$(br2)$(italic)Note the use of Demon Slate - wielding divine wrath requires mastery of the darkest blood magic.$()
